38 static const char* interlace_mode_to_string(int interlaced_mode_val){
39  const char * enum_names []= { NULL, "interlaced" , "progressive" , "none" , NULL };
40  return enum_names[interlaced_mode_val];
41 }

49 static gchar *create_raw_media(struct channelTable_entry * channel_entry, GstSDPMedia *media)
50 {
51  stream_data *data = channel_entry->stream_datas;
52  gchar *fmtp = g_strdup_printf ("%ld sampling=%s; width=%ld; height=%ld; depth=%ld; colorimetry=%s; %s",
53  data->rtp_datas->rtp_type,
54  channel_entry->channelVideoSampling,
55  channel_entry->channelHorzRes,
56  channel_entry->channelVertRes,
57  channel_entry->channelVideoBitDepth,
58  channel_entry->channelColorimetry,
59  interlace_mode_to_string (channel_entry->channelInterlaced)
60  );
61 
62  return fmtp;
63 }

71 static gchar *create_mpeg4_media(struct channelTable_entry * channel_entry, GstSDPMedia *media)
72 {
73  stream_data *data = channel_entry->stream_datas;
74  gchar *fmtp = g_strdup_printf("%ld profile-level-id=%s; config=%s",
75  data->rtp_datas->rtp_type,
76  data->rtp_datas->profile_level_id,
77  data->rtp_datas->config
78  );
79  return fmtp;
80 }

88 static gchar *create_j2k_media(struct channelTable_entry * channel_entry, GstSDPMedia *media)
89 {
90  stream_data *data = channel_entry->stream_datas;
91  gchar *fmtp = g_strdup_printf ("%ld sampling=%s; width=%ld; height=%ld;",
92  data->rtp_datas->rtp_type,
93  channel_entry->channelVideoSampling,
94  channel_entry->channelHorzRes,
95  channel_entry->channelVertRes/*,
96  interlace_mode_to_string (channel_entry->channelInterlaced)*/
97  );
98  return fmtp;
99 }

106 static gboolean error_function(){
107  g_critical("Problem in SDP file\n");
108  return FALSE;
109 }
110 
117 static gboolean create_fmtp_media(struct channelTable_entry * channel_entry, GstSDPMedia *media)
118 {
119  gchar *fmtp; /* the string to retrieve the fmtp line of SDP file */
120  if ( !strcmp( channel_entry->channelVideoFormat, RAW_NAME )){ // case RAW format
121  fmtp = create_raw_media(channel_entry, media) ;
122  if ( ! fmtp )
123  return error_function();
124  }else if ( !strcmp(channel_entry->channelVideoFormat , MPEG4_NAME )){ // case MPEG-6 format
125  fmtp = create_mpeg4_media(channel_entry, media) ;
126  if ( ! fmtp )
127  return error_function();
128  }else if ( !strcmp( channel_entry->channelVideoFormat , J2K_NAME)){ // case J2000 format
129  fmtp = create_j2k_media(channel_entry, media) ;
130  if ( ! fmtp )
131  return error_function();
132  }else{
133  return error_function();
134  }
135 
136  /* if the channel is a ROI, then add roiTop and roiLeft paramerters */
137  if ( channel_entry->channelType == roi ){
138 
139  /*
140  * The roi parameters to add to the ftmp SDP's line
141  * Adding a space ' ' at the beginning of this line hase been done on purpose,
142  * as we will concatenate it to the existing fmtp line
143  */
144  gchar *roi_params = g_strdup_printf ("; roiTop=%ld; roiLeft=%ld",
145  channel_entry->channelRoiOriginTop,
146  channel_entry->channelRoiOriginLeft);
147 
148  /*
149  * if this is a scalable ROI
150  */
151  if ( channel_entry->channelRoiExtentBottom != 0 || channel_entry->channelRoiExtentRight != 0 ){
152  gchar *roi_extent_params = g_strdup_printf("; roiBottom=%ld; roiRight=%ld",
153  channel_entry->channelRoiExtentBottom,
154  channel_entry->channelRoiExtentRight ) ;
155  roi_params = (gchar *) realloc ( roi_params , strlen( roi_params ) + strlen ( roi_extent_params ) + 1 );
156  strcat ( roi_params , roi_extent_params ) ;
157  free(roi_extent_params);
158  }
159 
160  /* extent ftmp buffer size so we can concatenate roi_params string to it */
161  fmtp = (gchar *) realloc ( fmtp , strlen( fmtp ) + strlen ( roi_params ) + 1 );
162  strcat ( fmtp , roi_params ) ;
163  free(roi_params);
164 
165  }
166 
167  if( gst_sdp_media_add_attribute (media, "fmtp", fmtp)!= GST_SDP_OK ){
168  g_critical("problem in media creation for SDP file\n");
169  return error_function();
170  }
171 
172  free(fmtp); /* memory has been allocated in creta_medianame_media() function */
173  return TRUE;
174 }
175 
181 gboolean create_SDP(GstSDPMessage *msg, struct channelTable_entry * channel_entry){
182 
183  stream_data *data = channel_entry->stream_datas;
184 
185  /* version : shall be set to 0 for VIVOE
186  * v=0
187  */
188  if (gst_sdp_message_set_version(msg, "0")){
189  g_warning("Failed to set version in SDP message\n");
190  return FALSE;
191  }
192  /* origine:
193  * o=<username> <session id> <session version> <network type> <address type> <address>
194  */
195  /* build session id and session version using random numbers*/
196  srand(time(NULL));
197  int session_id = rand();
198  int session_version = session_id;
199 
200  char session_id_str[32];
201  sprintf(session_id_str, "%d", session_id);
202 
203  char session_version_str[32];
204  sprintf(session_version_str, "%d", session_version);
205 
206  /* get multicast IP from MIB */
207  struct in_addr ip_addr;
208  ip_addr.s_addr = ethernetIfTable_head->ethernetIfIpAddress;
209 
210  gst_sdp_message_set_origin ( msg,
211  "-" /* username*/,
212  session_id_str /* sessionid*/,
213  session_version_str/* sessionversion*/,
214  network_type, /* network type :internet (always for VIVOE)*/
215  address_type, /* address type :IPV4 (always for VIVOE)*/
216  inet_ntoa(ip_addr) /* multicast IP*/
217  );
218 
219  /* session name
220  * s=<session name>
221  */
222  /* Build session name from deviceUserDesc Value and DeviceChannel value */
223  /* Create a buffer that will contain the concatenation of deviceUserDesc and ChannelUserDesc
224  * Both of those Strings are 64 bytes strings, so at most, session name will be a 129 bytes string
225  * because we will add a space " " character between those two strings
226  */
227  char session_name[DisplayString64*2+1];
228  /* Get deviceUserDesc Value */
229  memcpy(session_name, deviceInfo.parameters[num_DeviceUD]._value.string_val, strlen(deviceInfo.parameters[num_DeviceUD]._value.string_val));
230  strcat(session_name, " ");
231  strcat(session_name, channel_entry->channelUserDesc);
232  gst_sdp_message_set_session_name(msg, session_name);
233 
234  /* connection:
235  * c=<network type> <address type> <address>
236  */
237  long ip = define_vivoe_multicast(ethernetIfTable_head , channel_entry->channelIndex);
238  /* transform IP from long to char * */
239  struct in_addr multicast_addr;
240  multicast_addr.s_addr = ip;
241  gst_sdp_message_set_connection (msg, network_type, address_type, inet_ntoa(multicast_addr) , address_ttl, 0);
242 
243 
244  /* time : shall be set yo 0 0 in VIVOE to describe an unbound session
245  *
246  * t=<start time> <stop time>
247  */
248  gst_sdp_message_add_time(msg, "0", "0", NULL);
249 
250  /* media:
251  * m=<media> <port> <transport> <fmt list>
252  */
253  GstSDPMedia *media;
254  if( gst_sdp_media_new (&media)!= GST_SDP_OK)
255  return error_function();
256  if( gst_sdp_media_set_media (media, media_type )!= GST_SDP_OK)
257  return error_function();
258  if (gst_sdp_media_set_port_info (media, DEFAULT_MULTICAST_PORT, 1 )!= GST_SDP_OK)
259  return error_function();
260  if ( gst_sdp_media_set_proto ( media,transport_proto )!= GST_SDP_OK)
261  return error_function();
262 
263  if( gst_sdp_media_add_format(media, g_strdup_printf ("%ld", data->rtp_datas->rtp_type))!= GST_SDP_OK)
264  return error_function();
265 
266  /* convert rtp_type into string, max value is 107 so a 4 bytes string */
267  gchar *rtmpmap = g_strdup_printf ("%ld %s/%d", data->rtp_datas->rtp_type,channel_entry->channelVideoFormat ,data->rtp_datas->clock_rate );
268  if( gst_sdp_media_add_attribute (media, "rtpmap",rtmpmap ) != GST_SDP_OK)
269  return error_function();
270 
271  create_fmtp_media(channel_entry, media);
272 
273  /* Add framerate to media information */
274  gchar *framerate = g_strdup_printf("%ld", channel_entry->channelFps);
275  if( gst_sdp_media_add_attribute (media, "framerate", framerate)!= GST_SDP_OK ) /* Add the media to SDP message */
276  return error_function();
277  if ( gst_sdp_message_add_media (msg, media))
278  return error_function();
279 // printf("%s\n", gst_sdp_message_as_text(msg));
280  free(rtmpmap);
281  free(framerate);
282  return TRUE;
283 }
284 
291 GstCaps* get_SDP(unsigned char *array, int sdp_msg_size, in_addr_t *multicast_addr, char *channel_desc){
292 
293  GstSDPMessage *msg;
294  /* create a new SDP message */
295  if (gst_sdp_message_new(&msg)){
296  g_critical("Failed to create SDP message\n");
297  return NULL;
298  }
299 
300  /* parse the octet string to fill the SDP msg structure */
301  if( gst_sdp_message_parse_buffer (array, sdp_msg_size, msg) != GST_SDP_OK){
302  g_critical("Failed to parse SDP message\n");
303  return NULL;
304  }
305  /* get the multicast address of the incoming SDP message */
306  const GstSDPConnection *connection;
307  connection = gst_sdp_message_get_connection (msg);
308 
309  *multicast_addr = inet_addr(connection->address);
310  /* check if the multicast group is indeed, the one we should receive */
311 
312  const GstSDPMedia *media;
313  if (gst_sdp_message_medias_len (msg) > 1 ){
314  g_critical("more than one media in SDP message\n");
315  return NULL;
316  }
317 
318  /* get session description */
319  strcpy(channel_desc , gst_sdp_message_get_session_name(msg));
320 
321  /* get caps from the SDP's media field */
322  media = gst_sdp_message_get_media(msg , 0);
323 
324  /* get the caps from Media */
325  GstCaps *caps = gst_sdp_media_get_caps_from_media (media, 96);
326 
327  /* set framerate to caps */
328  GValue res = G_VALUE_INIT;
329  g_value_init (&res, GST_TYPE_FRACTION);
330  int framerate_num = strtol(gst_sdp_media_get_attribute_val (media, "framerate"), NULL, 10);
331  gst_value_set_fraction(&res, framerate_num, 1 );
332 
333  gst_caps_set_value ( caps,
334  "framerate",
335  &res );
336 
337  return caps;
338 }
